description:
Located in Cherry Hill, New Jersey, the Murray Law Group, LP, provides exceptional counsel and support to a diverse range of clients throughout South Jersey and the surrounding areas who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Criminal defense for DUI, drug violations, and all other types of felonies and misdemeanors, including traffic violations
  • Personal injury, slip-and-fall accidents and motor vehicle accidents
  • Consumer bankruptcy
  • Wills and advance health care directives

The law firm's founder, attorney Ava Murray, has an extensive amount of legal experience to provide the solid, straightforward counsel you need to make the best-informed decisions regarding the legal issues you face. Personable, professional and responsive, she promises to do all she can to help you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you seek for your complex and pressing legal challenges as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible, and you can rely on her to respond to your calls and emails promptly.

Honored for her unmatched legal abilities and outstanding service, Ms. Murray has earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from her peers. Her law firm has also enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients.

To find out more about how Ms. Murray can best assist you with achieving the positive results you expect and deserve for the legal issues affecting your life, your livelihood and your future, you can contact the Murray Law Group, LP, to take advantage of her law firm's free initial consultation. She also currently offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
